page.title: 02LOCAL ENVIRONMENT
page.content: Jen Cleave said that changes in Kilkhampton have been on the farms.Some changes have been cutting out hedgerows & some woods have been cut down.Jen told me that there is no effect after some people drain the land.Mrs Cleave said that silage kills fish & sheep if it leaks into the water. Wendy Vanstone moved into a new house "Marwood",at Christmas 1984.She said that some farmers cut down hedgerows to get bigger fields.Wendy said that when they drain some bogs there is no after mess.Afterwards Mrs Vanstone said to me that silage sometimes poisons the water if it leaks.Also if you dip sheep in a river that is poisoned it kills the sheep & all the fish. { By Joanne Moore
